headline: ARMN's Margins Expand Despite Rising Costs: Will the Momentum Sustain?
summary: Aris Mining's AISC climbs 6.6% in Q3 2025, but higher gold prices and volumes lift margins 42% year over year, keeping profitability resilient.

headline: Gold and Silver Prices Hit Record Highs
summary: Precious metals prices scaled new peaks after U.S prosecutors launched a probe into Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, adding to concerns about the independence of the central bank.

headline: Silver and Gold Hit New Highs on Fed Probe and Heightened Geopolitical Tensions
summary: Gold and silver prices climb to record highs amid concerns over Fed independence and geopolitical tensions.

headline: Is AEM Stock a Screaming Buy After the 132% Price Surge in a Year?
summary: AEM's 132% rally in a year, strong cash flows and project progress suggest more upside, backed by surging gold prices.
